resources.string: This is a demo showing the usage of the Lightstreamer Android client library in order to receive real-time updates.
Use the start/pause button on the menu to open/close the connection to the Lightstreamer server.
Touch one of the stocks in the list to see its details.
Navigate the sources of the demo application on github github.com/Lightstreamer/Lightstreamer-example-AdvStockList-client-android and check out our website www.lightstreamer.com
Live charts are plotted using androidplot androidplot.com
An extended version of this demo, supporting mobile push notifications, is also avalable, see play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.lightstreamer.simple_demo.android
